extendedInfo.description: TRIO is a simple, fun and extremely addictive game! Create a sequence of three or more balls of the same color to make them disappear. Trios can be formed horizontally, vertically or diagonally.Game features:- 9 cool different skins including a color blind mode- Global top scores list- Cool music and sound effects

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work....
reviews.comment: Does not work on my EVO LTE.  No matter what motion I do, they just drop straight to the bottom. Can\'t move side to side or change order. Good idea and would be 5* if it would work. Until then 1.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Game doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: SAMSUNG GALAXY 10.1  when I touch the screen to move left or right, the balls drops immediately to the bottom.  there is no way to control them and position where I want.  I love this game on my iphone, wished it worked on my tablet.  maybe I should exchange to an pad!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'m addicted to this game! Only thing that bugs me is..going slow at times & draining my battery. Good game tho!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LoveIt!!!
reviews.comment: Easy time passer. Occupies your hands but not your mind. Good game to think with.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: Every time I jus barely touch the screen the balls jus drop straight down.  No way to move order of balls or slide on board. Can\'t play. Love the other games by labpixies. Please adjust this problem.
reviews.author: Kristin Tate

reviews.comment: Cool game..love labpixi apps but this one has distorted diagonal split screen on samsung moment 2.1 eclaire/All other apps look great but not this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The idea is fun but controls are way to sensitive, which makes this game annoying

reviews.comment: Its alright the concept is there and all, but i find its boring
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Screen messed up
reviews.comment: Game screen sizing is not dynamic so it\'s unplayable on my nexus 4. items of the site if the game area and messed up graphics.   Pity I enjoy this type of game! Poor effort!
reviews.author: Bill Cumming

reviews.comment: and perhaps the 4G LTE service may have something to do with this app having issue. Before it would let you move column of balls dropping to any column you chose. On DROID razr it goes so fast yet you don\'t have a chance to do anything or should I say it is that you can not. Every time it immediately goes straight to the bottom of the center column which is where it enters. You only get about three drops of three balls and it is all over. What has happened because now it is no longer fun to play. It was good little app to play a few games waiting maybe or to take your thoughts away from something and to kill a few minutes. Am I doing anything wrong? Please fix this if possible or it will no use to me on the phone I have and so I am considering an uninstall. So sorry, but it sure was fun before.@\tI have had this for a couple of years and other Lab Pixies games. It used to be fun because you could kill some time if you were waiting or wanted to take your mind off something else.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love it! It is very addictive.

reviews.title: Controls don\'t work
reviews.comment: Galaxy S3 - When I try to move the balls or change their order, it just pushes them down...and game over. No fun. Please fix! Higher rating then. Lab Pixies makes some of the better games.

reviews.comment: Lite spin on the tried-and-true Tetris but something\'s off. The controls, the game speed are awkward and inhibiting to game play/functionality.
